edu.rit.swing

Class TranscriptFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • edu.rit.swing.TranscriptFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class TranscriptFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class TranscriptFrame is a Java Swing frame (window) that displays plain text written to an output stream. It is a JFrame containing a Transcript.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle)
      Construct a new transcript frame.
      TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle, java.awt.Font theFont)
      Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font.
      TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle, java.awt.Font theFont, int theMaxLines)
      Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font and that will display the given maximum number of lines.
      TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle, java.awt.Font theFont, int theMaxLines, int theVisibleLines, int theVisibleColumns)
      Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font, that will display the given maximum number of lines, and that will have the given number of lines and columns visible.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_FONT

        public static final java.awt.Font DEFAULT_FONT
        Default font: sanserif, plain, 9 point.

        public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_LINES
        Default maximum number of lines: 24.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Default visible number of lines: 24.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TranscriptFrame

        public TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle)
        Construct a new transcript frame. The transcript will use the default font (9 point monospaced). The transcript will display the default maximum number of lines (24). The transcript will have the default number of lines and columns visible (24x80).
        Parameters:
        theTitle - Frame title.

      • TranscriptFrame

        public TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle,
               java.awt.Font theFont)
        Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font. The transcript will display the default maximum number of lines (24). The transcript will have the default number of lines and columns visible (24x80).
        Parameters:
        theTitle - Frame title.
        theFont - Font to use for the transcript display.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if theFont is null.

      • TranscriptFrame

        public TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle,
               java.awt.Font theFont,
               int theMaxLines)
        Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font and that will display the given maximum number of lines. The transcript will have the default number of lines and columns visible (24x80).
        Parameters:
        theTitle - Frame title.
        theFont - Font to use for the transcript display.
        theMaxLines - Maximum number of lines displayed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if theFont is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if theMaxLines is less than or equal to 0.

      • TranscriptFrame

        public TranscriptFrame(java.lang.String theTitle,
               java.awt.Font theFont,
               int theMaxLines,
               int theVisibleLines,
               int theVisibleColumns)
        Construct a new transcript frame that will use the given font, that will display the given maximum number of lines, and that will have the given number of lines and columns visible.
        Parameters:
        theTitle - Frame title.
        theFont - Font to use for the transcript display.
        theMaxLines - Maximum number of lines displayed.
        theVisibleLines - Number of lines visible.
        theVisibleColumns - Number of columns visible.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if theFont is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if theMaxLines is less than or equal to 0. Thrown if theVisibleLines is less than or equal to 0. Thrown if theVisibleColumns is less than or equal to 0.

        Returns the JTextArea component used to display the text of this transcript.

        Returns the OutputStream used to write into this transcript.

           throws java.io.IOException
        Clear this transcript.
        Throws:
